CUSTOMER CONNECT NOVEMBER 2019
Happy Thanksgiving from your Customer and Product Support team!
This month, I’ll highlight the field service engineer team and latest profile, the technical support video of the month and other pertinent customer support updates. I am your temporary Customer Support Manager please feel free to reply to this email if you have any questions. Did You Know? This Season We’re Thankful for our Support Heroes With 130-some field service engineers globally, our support heroes are committed to solving your toughest technical aviation challenges. Whether its answering questions, troubleshooting complex issues or deploying to a hangar, these heroes take a personal interest in creating the best support experience for our operators. Meet the team of experts dedicated to solving our customers’ technical issues on business and general aviation aircraft. Read more. <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/field-service-engineers-americas?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_cps&utm_content=customer-connect-newsletter]]>
Field Service Engineer Profile: Jack Farley Just Listen to this Engineer’s Secret to Success A former welder, machinist, and aircraft and power plant mechanic, Jack Farley knows how to use his hands on the job. But in his current role as a senior field service engineer at Honeywell. Jack relies most often on his ears. Read more. <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/news/2019/11/just-listen-to-this-engineer-s-secret-to-success?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_cps&utm_content=customer-connect-newsletter]]>
Sun Never Sets on Honeywell Technical Support Technical support is all about creating a great customer experience – every time. Honeywell is working to provide business aviation customers with better, faster, more responsive service, while still maintaining the personal touch that has been so much a part of Honeywell’s character over the years. Read More. <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/blogs/2019/11/sun-never-sets-on-honeywell-technical-support?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_cps&utm_content=customer-connect-newsletter]]>
Video Training Resources at your Fingertips – AERO TV For this month’s video segment, I would like to highlight the AERO TV Training hub. AERO TV is an extensive library of technical training videos can help you stay up-to-date on the latest tools and techniques for maintaining the Honeywell equipment on your aircraft. Learn more. <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/training/videos?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_cps&utm_content=customer-connect-newsletter]]> If you need additional customer support, I am your point of contact.
